content: You get- community management 24/7- help to connect with other projects- technical feedback and ideas for your project- Discord and Telegram adminhttps://www.linkedin.com/in/janemil/https://t.me/JanEmilhttps://opensea.io/JanEmilChristiansenBehavioral analyze Report for Jan Emil Christiansen https://1drv.ms/b/s!Auvi80rHPMuIiUYmnrkvyLkQzIJn?e=TzyZ4NHave helped : Exchanges, Coins, Tokens, Games, DEFI, Masternodes and NFT projects.Me- 7 years in crypto- 48 year old- uses real name and can KYC- technical knowledge from 25 years as IT professional- helped more than 20 crypto projectsI bring full team if you need 24/7 community management.

comments.author: JanEmil
comments.body: Now Community manager telegram and Discord for. https://goldfever.ioIncluding some help with general blockchain knowledge to team.Have time for 1 team more. Any that need help?

comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHFs on April 06, 2023, 08:47:28 PMmentioning the price is so importantJust contact him and ask directly for his price it could be a better idea, maybe.Instead of trying to know price of everything and troll (one day you want to launch an HF, another day you want to hire a copywriter for a whitepaper, another day you want to launch a mining pool), why don't you try to startto be more respectful here?Thanks.
